metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9939 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
ihex.c in GNU Binutils before 2.26 contains a stack buffer overflow whenprinting bad bytes in Intel Hex objects.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04
gdb-multiarch - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04
gdb-source - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04
gdb64 - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04
gdbserver - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04
No subscription required

binutils - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-multiarch - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-source - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.04').
binutils package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.3').
